subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Chris Seitz has remained out of the spotlight during the under-20 World Cup, and that’s been a good thing for the United States, which has played attractive, attacking soccer, for the most part.
snippet: Goalkeeper Chris Seitz has remained out of the spotlight during the under-20 World Cup, and that’s been a good thing for the United States, which has played attractive, attacking soccer, for the most part.
